document_data.name: Belzer's Walk
document_data.mainbody: '''Belzer's Walk''' was an alleyway in [[Waterdeep]] that stood on the boundary line of the city's [[Waterdeep/Southern Ward|Southern Ward]] and [[Waterdeep/Trades Ward|Trades Ward]].<ref group="note" name="name">''[[The City of Waterdeep Trail Map]]'' and page 105 of the sourcebook ''[[Volo's Guide to Waterdeep]]'' both misspell this road as "Belz'''o'''r's Walk". Some referred to the road as simply '''Belzer's''', much to the chagrin of Southern Ward locals, who were quick to correct those who called it such.
document_data.Location: Paved in dirt and gravel, this alley stretched northeast out of [[Caravan Court]] and terminated on [[Wall Street]].
